trans-unit.source: Displays a hierarchical collection of labeled items, each represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示階層式標記項目所代表的每個集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that are assigned to the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>集合會保存所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>指派給樹狀檢視控制項的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes in this collection are referred to as the root tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的樹狀節點稱為根樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: Any tree node that is subsequently added to a root tree node is referred to as a child node.
trans-unit.target: 任何後續會新增至根樹狀節點的樹狀節點稱為子節點。

trans-unit.source: Because each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can contain a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, you might find it difficult to determine your location in the tree structure when you iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 因為每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>可以包含其他集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件，您可能會發現很難判斷您樹狀結構中的位置，當您逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can parse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> string by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: 您可以剖析<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>字串使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>字串值，以判斷 where<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>標籤開始和結束。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can display images next to the tree nodes by assigning an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property and referencing the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to assign that <xref:System.Drawing.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>屬性和參考<xref:System.Drawing.Image><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>若要指派該<xref:System.Drawing.Image>.</xref:System.Drawing.Image></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList></xref:System.Drawing.Image>的索引值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>顯示的樹狀節點旁的映像

trans-unit.source: Use the following properties to assign images: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 若要指派映像使用下列屬性:-設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>屬性的索引值<xref:System.Drawing.Image>您想要顯示未選取樹狀節點時。</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> that you want to display when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: -設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性的索引值<xref:System.Drawing.Image>您想要顯示選取樹狀節點時。</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The images referenced by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property values are the default images displayed by all the tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性值會指派給所有樹狀節點都顯示之預設影像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual tree nodes can override the default images by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 個別的樹狀節點可以設定覆寫預設映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the TreeView are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀檢視中顯示之狀態影像是預設的 16 x 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>不會影響在映像的顯示方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 不過，狀態影像會調整的大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```可以展開樹狀節點，以顯示子樹狀節點的下一個層級。

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by clicking the plus-sign (+) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, or you can expand the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以展開<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>按一下加號 （+） 按鈕，如果其中一個旁會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，您可以展開或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To expand all the child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要展開子樹狀結構節點中的所有層級<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>集合，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or the user can press the minus-sign (-) button, if one is displayed next to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以摺疊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>層級藉由呼叫的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或使用者可以按下減號 （-） 按鈕，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>旁邊顯示的其中一個</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>子系

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to alternate between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>之間切換展開和摺疊狀態的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀節點可以選擇性地顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the TreeView to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示核取方塊，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性以 TreeView `true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>屬性設定為`true`為樹狀節點處於選取狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>事件造成引發的事件，多次，而且可能會造成非預期的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>的事件處理常式，當您以遞迴方式更新，讓使用者不必展開並檢查每個個別的子節點的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免事件所引發的許多次，將邏輯加入至事件處理常式只執行您遞迴的程式碼，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to do this, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> events.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何執行此動作的範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>

trans-unit.source: You can change the appearance of the TreeView control by setting some of its display and style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定其顯示和樣式屬性的某些變更樹狀檢視控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> to `true` displays a plus-sign or minus-sign button next to each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that can be expanded or collapsed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>至`true`會顯示每旁邊的加號或減號按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，可以展開或摺疊，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property to `true` causes the TreeView to display lines that join all the root tree nodes together.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>屬性`true`會導致顯示聯結在一起的根樹狀結構節點的行 TreeView。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display lines that connect child tree nodes to their root node by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示藉由設定連接至其根節點的子樹狀節點的行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A> property to `true` changes the appearance of the tree node labels as the mouse pointer passes over them.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>屬性`true`樹狀節點標籤的外觀，當滑鼠指標經過的變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HotTracking%2A>

trans-unit.source: When hot-tracked, the tree node labels take on the appearance of a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 當熱追蹤時，樹狀目錄節點標籤採用超連結外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can also completely customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 您也完全可以自訂 TreeView 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>屬性以外的值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>及處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties at run time, the TreeView handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性在執行階段，TreeView 控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 更新控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致摺疊，但選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>除外的所有樹狀節點

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the tree node check box is checked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於選取樹狀節點核取方塊之後。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> or AfterCheck event handler causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck>或 AfterCheck 事件處理常式會導致引發的事件，多次，而且可能會造成非預期的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免事件所引發的許多次，將邏輯加入至事件處理常式只執行您遞迴的程式碼，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生於摺疊樹狀節點之後。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生於編輯樹狀節點標籤文字之後。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 發生於選取樹狀節點之後。

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur when the node is unselected.
trans-unit.target: 未選取這個節點時，就不會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: To detect whether the selection was cleared, you can test the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要偵測是否已清除選取項目，您可以測試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsSelected%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，代表控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景影像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is the background image for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property from within the BeforeCheck or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> event causes the event to be raised multiple times and can result in unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>從 BeforeCheck 內的屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck>事件造成引發的事件，多次，而且可能會造成非預期的行為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterCheck> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property in the event handler when you are recursively updating the child nodes, so that the user does not have to expand and check each one individually.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>的事件處理常式，當您以遞迴方式更新其子節點，以便使用者沒有即可展開並檢查每一個個別的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the event from being raised multiple times, add logic to your event handler that only executes your recursive code if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免事件所引發的許多次，將邏輯加入至事件處理常式只執行您遞迴的程式碼，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs>未設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewAction?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: Disables any redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 停用任何重繪作業的樹狀檢視。

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the BeginUpdate method.
trans-unit.target: 為維護效能，而項目會加入一次一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，呼叫 BeginUpdate 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdate method prevents the control from painting until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdate 方法可防止直到繪製控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目加入至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將樹狀目錄節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用 BeginUpdate 方法以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To allow the control to resume painting, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要允許繼續繪製控制項，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>時所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀檢視控制項的框線樣式。

trans-unit.target: 當 BorderStyle 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>有下凹的&3;d 外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>

trans-unit.source: To display a flat, thin border around the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 一般、 精簡周圍顯示框線<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 指派的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether check boxes are displayed next to the tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出樹狀檢視控制項中的樹狀節點旁是否顯示核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: A check box is displayed to the left of both the tree node label and tree node <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊會顯示左邊的樹狀節點標籤和 樹狀節點<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，若有的話。</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Check boxes allow the user to select more than one tree node at a time.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊可讓使用者一次選取多個樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: When the CheckBoxes property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 時的核取方塊屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>設為`true`，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>設定屬性，則每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>顯示的第一個和第二個映像從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>以表示若未選取或核取狀態，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: However, the displayed images may be different if the following situation occurs: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> of the node is set to a value other than 0 or 1, and the CheckBoxes property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> will not automatically reset to -1 to indicate it is not set.
trans-unit.target: 不過，顯示映像可能會不同，如果發生下列情況︰ 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>節點的設定為 0 或 1 和父代的核取方塊屬性以外的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>設`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>將不會自動重設為-1，表示未設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the state image at the indicated index position is shown.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會顯示在指定的索引位置之狀態影像。

trans-unit.source: If CheckBoxes is set to `true` again, the first and second images of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> are shown to indicate a checked or unchecked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果核取方塊設定為`true`同樣地，第一個和第二個影像的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>來分別表示 checked 或 unchecked 狀態，會顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the CheckBoxes property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定的核取方塊屬性時執行階段<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 更新控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致摺疊，但選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>除外的所有樹狀節點

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a check box is displayed next to each tree node in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在樹狀檢視控制項中; 每個樹狀節點旁會顯示核取方塊否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Collapses all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 摺疊所有樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method collapses all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: CollapseAll 方法摺疊所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件，其中包含所有的子樹狀結構節點，位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>仍然存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method for a root tree node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>根樹狀節點的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the child tree nodes were not previously collapsed, they will appear in their previously-expanded state.
trans-unit.target: 如果子樹狀節點不先前摺疊，它們會出現在其先前的展開狀態。

trans-unit.source: Calling the CollapseAll method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 CollapseAll 方法可確保所有樹狀節點都顯示中摺疊的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The DrawMode property lets you customize the appearance of the nodes.

trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請將設定 DrawMode<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>和提供的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 屬性值不是有效<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*> property is set to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>繪製和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>屬性設定為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"></xref>以外值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode*>

trans-unit.source: Use this event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件可自訂外觀中的節點<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>使用主控描繪控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: 會引發這個事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> property is set to these values.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>可以當自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A>屬性設定為這些值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: |DrawMode property value|TreeNode customization| |-----------------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label area can be customized.
trans-unit.target: |DrawMode 屬性值 |TreeNode 自訂 | |-----------------------------|----------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>標籤區域可以自訂。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> elements are drawn automatically.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|The appearance of the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can be customized.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>項目會自動繪製。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>|整個外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>可以自訂。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Icons, check boxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes must be drawn manually if they are desired.| The region that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value would occupy if it were drawn using the font specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: 圖示的核取方塊，加號和減號，而且如果需要連接節點的線條也必須以手動方式繪製。 | 區域，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果它所使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>屬性是在其中的節點可點按來加以選取的地區</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>所指定的字型來繪製，會佔用值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is called the hit test region.
trans-unit.target: 這稱為點擊的測試區域。

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this region, you should provide your own code that selects a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在此區域之外繪製時，您應該提供自己的程式碼，在按下的可見區域時選取的節點。

trans-unit.source: The hit test region corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: 對應至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性時使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的點擊的測試區域

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property encompasses the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>，不過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>的整個寬度</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can access the hit test region by getting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value and accessing its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以存取的點擊的測試區域取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值及存取其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Bounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then draw the hit test region of the node within these bounds, or you can provide your own hit test code.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以繪製這些的範圍內節點的點擊的測試區域，或您可以提供自己的點擊的測試程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not change the size of the hit test region, which is calculated using the font specified for the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性不會變更點擊的測試區域，這使用計算的整個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>指定之字型的大小</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NodeFont%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Enables the redrawing of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 啟用樹狀檢視的重繪作業。

trans-unit.source: To maintain performance while items are added one at a time to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 為維護效能，而項目會加入一次一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method prevents the control from painting until the EndUpdate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法會防止控制項繪製 EndUpdate 方法呼叫之前。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to a tree view control is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method to add an array of tree node items to a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要將項目加入至樹狀檢視控制項的慣用的方法是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>方法，將樹狀目錄節點項目的陣列加入至樹狀檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control from painting during the add operations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要一次新增一個項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項從 新增作業期間的繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To allow control the control to resume painting, call the EndUpdate method when all the tree nodes have been added to the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 若要允許控制項的控制項，繼續繪製，EndUpdate 時呼叫方法，所有樹狀節點已都加入至樹狀檢視。

trans-unit.source: Expands all the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 展開所有樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, which includes all the child tree nodes, that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: ExpandAll 方法會展開所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件，其中包含所有的子樹狀結構節點，位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> persists.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>仍然存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method, and then the individual root tree nodes are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法，然後個別的根樹狀節點會摺疊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child tree nodes have not been collapsed, and will appear in their previously-expanded state when the root tree nodes are expanded again.
trans-unit.target: 子樹狀節點不已摺疊，並再次展開根樹狀節點時，會出現在其先前的展開狀態。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> method ensures that all the tree nodes appear in the collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>方法可確保所有樹狀節點都顯示中摺疊的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: When FullRowSelect is `true`, a selection highlight spans the entire width of the tree view, display instead of the width of just the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: FullRowSelect 時`true`、 選取項目反白顯示跨過樹狀檢視的整個寬度、 顯示而不是只樹狀節點標籤的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The FullRowSelect property is ignored if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果，則會忽略 FullRowSelect 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.target: 擷取位於指定處的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.target: 您可以傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件做為<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>新<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>值</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>和</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>座標</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of tree nodes, optionally including those in all subtrees, assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取樹狀目錄節點數目，選擇性地包括所有指派給樹狀檢視控制項中的子目錄中。

trans-unit.target: 如果`includeSubTrees`是`true`，結果是整個樹狀結構中的所有樹狀節點的數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to count the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that the subtrees contain; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected tree node remains highlighted even when the tree view has lost the focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出即使樹狀檢視已遺失焦點選取的樹狀節點是否維持反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, selected nodes in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control remain highlighted in a different color than the current selection color when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`false`，選取的節點中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項維持在不同於目前的選取範圍的色彩反白顯示色彩的時機<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項遺失駐點。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep items that are selected by the user visible when the user clicks a different control on the form or moves to a different window.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，讓使用者按一下表單上不同的控制項，或移到不同的視窗時，顯示使用者已選取項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are concerned with the accessibility of your applications, it is recommended that you set the HideSelection property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您不在意您應用程式的存取範圍，則建議您將 HideSelection 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷是否位於點<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>以及節點內點的位置，例如標籤或影像區域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Provides node information, given x- and y-coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 提供有給定 x 和 y 座標的節點資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a set of x- and y-coordinates is located in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and where within the node the point is located, such as on the label or image area.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷是否位於一組的 x 和 y 座標<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>以及節點內點的位置，例如標籤或影像區域。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate at which to retrieve node information
trans-unit.target: X 座標管理在其上擷取節點資訊

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate at which to retrieve node information.
trans-unit.target: 擷取節點資訊的 y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The node information.
trans-unit.target: 節點資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否採用外觀為超連結的樹狀節點標籤滑鼠指標移至它。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true`, the HotTracking property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性設定為`true`，hottracking 開啟屬性沒有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the HotTracking property is set to `true`, each tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hottracking 開啟時屬性設定為`true`，每個樹狀節點標籤會在滑鼠指標通過的超連結外觀上透過它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> font style is applied to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> is set to blue to make the label appear as a link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>字型樣式套用至<xref:System.Drawing.Font>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>設為藍色，讓標籤會顯示為連結。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>

trans-unit.source: The appearance is not controlled by the Internet settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 外觀不是使用者的作業系統的網際網路設定所控制。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a tree node label takes on the appearance of a hyperlink as the mouse pointer passes over it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果樹狀節點標籤採用做為超連結外觀滑鼠指標經過;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image-list index value of the default image that is displayed by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀節點顯示之預設影像的影像清單索引值。

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>和 ImageIndex 屬性是互斥的另一個設定，如果會忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>, ImageIndex is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>，ImageIndex 自動設定為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您設定 ImageIndex，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>會自動設定為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the ImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ImageIndex 屬性設定執行階段時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>會重新建立控制代碼 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 更新控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致摺疊，但選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>除外的所有樹狀節點

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引，表示的位置<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是零。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image for each node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when it is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在每個節點的預設映像的索引鍵<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制會在未選取狀態時。

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 屬性是不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have an image set, the image specified by the ImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>沒有設定，屬性將會顯示當未選取的節點 ImageKey 所指定的映像的映像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When the node is selected, the first item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> will be shown.
trans-unit.target: 選取節點時，第一個項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>將會顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>屬性是互斥的這表示另一個設定，如果會忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定 ImageKey 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>屬性會自動設定為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property, the ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>屬性，ImageKey 會自動設定為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown for each node <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: 顯示每個節點的預設映像的索引鍵<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制節點處於未選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>包含<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>物件所使用的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property value is anything other than `null`, all the tree nodes display the first <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>屬性值不是`null`，所有樹狀節點都顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList></xref:System.Drawing.Image>第一個</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: You can specify which images from the list are displayed for selected and unselected nodes by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定哪一個映像，從清單會顯示選取和取消選取節點，藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects can specify which image is displayed by setting their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件可以指定要顯示哪一個映像藉由設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: These individual settings will override the settings in the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些個別的設定會覆寫中對應的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the .NET Framework version 1.1, there is an issue that prevents images from appearing on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> nodes when your application calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 1.1 版中，發生問題時，可防止影像出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>您的應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>時的節點</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>上

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in your `Main` method immediately after you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此問題，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中您`Main`方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This issue is fixed in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 已修正此問題[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects that are used by the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>物件所使用的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀節點層級的每個子系的縮排距離。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a value of -1 does not throw an exception if the value has not yet been changed from its default.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為-1 值不會擲回例外狀況如果值尚未已變更其預設值。

trans-unit.source: This is because the control uses a value of -1 as an internal default before the control handle has been created.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為控制項會使用內部預設值為-1 值之前已建立控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This internal default value causes the wrapped control to return its own default value of 19.
trans-unit.target: 此內部預設值會導致傳回它自己的預設值為 19 包裝的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, to indent each child tree node level.
trans-unit.target: 像素為單位，每個子樹狀節點層級的縮排距離。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 19.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 19。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than 0 (see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: 指派的值小於的 0 （請參閱 < 備註 >）。

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than 32,000.
trans-unit.target: -或者-指派的值大於 32000。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵或需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If the user is editing a tree node, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control treats keys such as ENTER, ESC, HOME, and END as input keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者在編輯節點的樹狀節點<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項的按鍵輸入，ESC 首頁，並結束例如視為輸入索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個按鍵值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的按鍵是標準輸入的按鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging a node.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者開始拖曳節點時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀檢視控制項中的每個樹狀節點高度。

trans-unit.source: If the item height is set to a value larger than the height of the tree view control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method will have unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目高度設為值超過樹狀檢視控制項的高度，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法會有非預期的結果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.EnsureVisible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of each tree node in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （以像素的樹狀檢視中的每個樹狀節點）。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是小於&1;。

trans-unit.source: -or- The assigned value is greater than the <xref:System.Int16.MaxValue> value.
trans-unit.target: -或-指派的值大於<xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>值。</xref:System.Int16.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the label text of the tree nodes can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可編輯樹狀節點標籤文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A> method works only if the LabelEdit property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>方法只適用於 LabelEdit 屬性為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If LabelEdit is `false` when you attempt to edit the label, an exception will be thrown and the tree node will not be put in to an editable state.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 LabelEdit`false`當您嘗試編輯標籤時，將會擲回例外狀況和樹狀目錄節點將無法放入可編輯的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the label text of the tree nodes can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可編輯樹狀節點標籤文字。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the lines connecting the nodes of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接的節點的線條色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the lines connecting the tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>一條線連接樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (**+**) or minus sign (**-**) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下滑鼠，包括加號的樹狀節點的任何部分，就會發生這個事件 (**+**) 或減號 (**-**)，表示節點是否已摺疊或展開。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user double-clicks any part of a tree node with the mouse, including the plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) that indicates whether the node is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按兩下滑鼠，包括加號 （+） 或減號 （-），表示節點是否已摺疊或展開樹狀任何的節點部分，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 發生於滑鼠停留<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the NodeMouseHover event will occur before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果透過滑鼠位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>，NodeMouseHover 事件發生之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of tree nodes that are assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得指派給樹狀檢視控制項的樹狀節點集合。

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property holds a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects, each of which has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 節點屬性會保存的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件，每一個都有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>可以包含它自己的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location within the tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 此巢狀結構的樹狀節點難以瀏覽樹狀結構中，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>屬性可讓您更輕鬆地判斷您在樹狀結構內的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that represents the tree nodes assigned to the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>代表指派給樹狀檢視控制項的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the OnKeyDown method switches between selecting and clearing the check box when the user presses the SPACEBAR.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control will select the first item that begins with the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property of `e`.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseHover method performs a hit test to see whether the mouse is located over a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, and if it is, raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.NodeMouseHover> event.

trans-unit.source: The tree node path consists of a set of tree node labels separated by the PathSeparator delimiter strings.
trans-unit.target: 樹狀節點路徑所組成的樹狀節點標籤隔開 PathSeparator 分隔符號字串的一組。

trans-unit.source: The labels range from the root tree node to the tree node that you want.
trans-unit.target: 標籤的範圍從根樹狀結構節點到您想要的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: The default is the backslash character (\\).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是反斜線字元 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: If you set RightToLeftLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> to `true` the control's contents and text will be laid out from right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定 RightToLeftLayout 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>至`true`控制項的內容和文字配置由右至左。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control should be laid out from right-to-left; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出樹狀檢視控制項是否在必要時顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is located outside the control's client region.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，捲軸會顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>位於控制項的用戶端區域外。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the Scrollable property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 執行階段設定的可捲動的屬性時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>會重新建立控制代碼 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 更新控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, with the exception of the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致摺疊，但選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>除外的所有樹狀節點

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree view control displays scroll bars when they are needed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果需要; 時，樹狀檢視控制項顯示捲軸否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when a tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取樹狀節點時顯示影像的影像清單索引值。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageIndex 值是索引<xref:System.Drawing.Image>儲存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When setting the SelectedImageIndex property at run time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> handle is recreated (see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to update the control's appearance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SelectedImageIndex 屬性設定執行階段時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制代碼會重新建立 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 更新控制項的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This causes all tree nodes to be collapsed, except for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致摺疊，但選取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>除外的所有樹狀節點

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的位置以零為起始的索引值<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>中<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The index assigned value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時顯示之預設影像的索引鍵<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>處於選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> does not have a selected image set, the image specified by the SelectedImageKey property will be shown when the node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>沒有選取的映像設定，屬性將會顯示當未選取的節點 SelectedImageKey 所指定的影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: SelectedImageKey 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性是互斥的另一個設定，如果會忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the SelectedImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定 SelectedImageKey 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性會自動設定為-1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property, the SelectedImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>屬性，SelectedImageKey 會自動設定為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the default image shown when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 預設映像時顯示的索引鍵<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>處於選取狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tree node that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀檢視控制項中目前選取的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is currently selected, the SelectedNode property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>是目前選取的 SelectedNode 屬性是`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, the specified node is scrolled into view and any parent nodes are expanded so that the specified node is visible.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定這個屬性時，指定的節點捲動到出現在檢視和任何父節點展開，以便顯示在指定的節點。

trans-unit.source: When the parent node or any ancestor node of the selected node is collapsed either programmatically or through user action, the collapsed node becomes the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 當父節點或任何上階節點，選取之節點的摺疊以程式設計方式或透過使用者的動作時，摺疊的節點會成為選取的節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that is currently selected in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>樹狀檢視控制項中目前選取的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在樹狀檢視控制項的樹狀節點之間繪製行。

trans-unit.source: If ShowLines is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 ShowLines `true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>屬性會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.FullRowSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between tree nodes in the tree view control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在樹狀檢視控制項; 樹狀節點之間繪製行否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: In order for ToolTips to be visible, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ToolTipText%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown when the mouse pointer hovers over a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
