trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether plus-sign (+) and minus-sign (-) buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出包含子樹狀節點的樹狀節點旁是否顯示加號 （+） 和減號 （-） 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The plus sign and minus sign buttons appear next to the root tree nodes only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根樹狀結構節點只有當旁邊的加號或減號按鈕出現<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>屬性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowRootLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the plus sign and minus sign buttons are not displayed, no visual cue exists to indicate that the tree node contains child tree nodes and is expandable.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有顯示加號和減號按鈕，沒有視覺提示存在，表示樹狀節點包含子樹狀節點，而且是可展開。

trans-unit.source: The user then must double-click a tree node to determine whether it contains child tree nodes, to expand it, or to collapse it.
trans-unit.target: 使用者必須按兩下樹狀節點來判斷它是否包含子樹狀節點，將它展開或摺疊它。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if plus sign and minus sign buttons are displayed next to tree nodes that contain child tree nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果包含子樹狀節點; 樹狀節點旁是否顯示加號和減號按鈕否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在位於樹狀檢視根部的樹狀節點之間繪製行。

trans-unit.source: If the ShowRootLines property is `false`, the plus-sign and minus-sign buttons will not appear next to the root tree nodes, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A> property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ShowRootLines 屬性為`false`，旁邊的根樹狀結構節點中，不會出現加號和減號按鈕和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>屬性會有任何作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ShowPlusMinus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if lines are drawn between the tree nodes that are at the root of the tree view; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果位於樹狀檢視; 根部的樹狀節點之間繪製行否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method reapplies the default sort, which is alphabetical by node text, or a custom sort specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會重新套用預設排序，這是依字母順序排列節點的文字或所指定的自訂排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.TreeViewNodeSorter%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method if the text of existing nodes is changed or nodes are moved by the user, and you want to sort the items again.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更現有節點的文字或節點已移動使用者，而您想要重新排序的項目，您可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 會使用預設的瀏覽<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>應用程式所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件具有相等的值會被新增到的順序保留<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 這種行為可能不同，如果套用自訂排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否排序樹狀檢視中的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: When Sorted is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects are sorted in alphabetical order by their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 當排序設`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件會依字母順序排序其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You should always use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A> to maintain performance when you add a large quantity of items to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該一律使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A>維護效能，當您將加入的項目已排序的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>數量龐大</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.EndUpdate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the text of an existing node is changed, you must call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> to resort the items.
trans-unit.target: 變更現有節點的文字時，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>訴諸項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 會使用預設的瀏覽<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>應用程式所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件具有相等的值會被新增到的順序保留<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree nodes in the tree view are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果排序樹狀檢視中的樹狀節點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來指示狀態的影像清單<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>和其節點。

trans-unit.source: To indicate the state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, set the StateImageList property and also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 表示的狀態<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>設定 StateImageList 屬性，也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The state images displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are 16 x 16 pixels by default.
trans-unit.target: 中所顯示之狀態影像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>預設 16 x 16 像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A> property of the StateImageList will have no effect on how the images are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>StateImageList 屬性不會影響在映像的顯示方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the state images are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ``` When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true` and the StateImageList property is set, each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> that is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> displays the first and second images from the StateImageList to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不過，狀態影像會調整的大小根據系統 DPI 設定時的 app.config 檔案包含下列項目︰``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>設`true`和設定屬性，則每個 StateImageList<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>會顯示以表示若未選取或核取狀態，分別 StateImageList 中的第一個和第二個影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageList property before you add nodes to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to prevent state images being shown at design time for nodes that do not have a state image set.
trans-unit.target: 您應該 StateImageList 之前設定屬性，將節點加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>若要防止狀態影像顯示在設計階段並沒有狀態影像的節點設定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> used for indicating the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> and its nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>用來表示的狀態<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>和其節點。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Null" name="Null" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樹狀檢視控制項中的第一個完整可見的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the TopNode returns the first root tree node, which is located at the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: TopNode 一開始，傳回第一個的根樹狀結構節點，位於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>頂端

trans-unit.source: However, if the user has scrolled the contents, another tree node might be at the top.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果使用者已捲動內容，另一個樹狀結構節點可能位於頂端。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property has no effect when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>屬性值是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Scrollable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the first fully-visible tree node in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>表示樹狀檢視控制項的第一個完整可見的樹狀節點。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>包含名稱的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>，若有的話。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不應該覆寫。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含名稱的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>，若有的話，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>未命名。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation of <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform a custom sort of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定實作<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>執行自訂排序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>節點。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The custom sort is applied when the TreeViewNodeSorter is set.
trans-unit.target: TreeViewNodeSorter 設定時，會套用的自訂排序。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> label is changed, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> method to sort the items again with the custom sorter specified by the TreeViewNodeSorter property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>標籤變更，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A>方法，以再次 TreeViewNodeSorter 屬性所指定的自訂瀏覽與排序的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default sorter uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A> method based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> specified by the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 會使用預設的瀏覽<xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>方法根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A>應用程式所指定。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.CurrentCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects with equal value are kept in the order in which they were added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 這表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件具有相等的值會被新增到的順序保留<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This behavior may be different if a custom sort is applied.
trans-unit.target: 這種行為可能不同，如果套用自訂排序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> to perform the custom sort.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>來執行自訂排序。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of tree nodes that can be fully visible in the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: 取得樹狀檢視控制項中完整可見的樹狀節點的數目。

trans-unit.source: The VisibleCount value can be greater than the number of tree nodes in the tree view.
trans-unit.target: VisibleCount 值可能會大於樹狀檢視中的樹狀節點數。

trans-unit.source: The value is calculated by dividing the height of the client window by the height of a tree node item.
trans-unit.target: 相除的用戶端視窗的高度，樹狀目錄節點項目的高度來計算值。

trans-unit.source: The result is the total number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> can display within its current dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 結果是總數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>可以顯示在其目前的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> items that can be fully visible in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>中完整可見的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc*>
